sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { registerUser } from '../features/user/userAction' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' const SignUpForm = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm() const { loading, error } = useSelector(state => state.user) const submitForm = (data) => { // transform email string to lowercase to avoid case sensitivity issues during login data.email = data.email.toLowerCase() dispatch(registerUser(data)) console.log(data) } return (
) } export default SignUpForm
